item.title: Shot Fired - IVORY [collab]
item.dc:creator: VJM
item.description:
I do like the main feel of the song, and there were a few things that stood out to me while listening.

You had a ton of instruments playing at the same time and I felt that many weren’t mixed very well. A solution would be to simply take some out and/or lower their volumes and reverb.

Also, the drop did not come until much later in the song. This isn’t necessarily bad, but to do this right you need have a:
low point of the song (with less instruments, a calmer feel),
to transition smoothly into the high point (an epic buildup, epic drop)
and then transition back into a low point to match the next drop.

Otherwise, it’s a very good song imo, I cannot wait till I hear the finished project.
Keep up the good work my friend!

Read full topic
